Steps.StepString: Look at the /robots.txt file of the challenge page.
Observe that the disallow text includes a double equal sign and spans across three lines.
Surmise that the base 64 text is actually three separate strings.
Decode each line of the base 64 strings separately.
Navigate to the path indicated in the second line of the decoded strings, js/myfile.txt.
Retrieve the flag from the myfile.txt page.
